attributes.action: Ban all Guns. Stop making them Wordwide
attributes.additional_details:
I wish to call for the attention of all world-wide governments TO BAN gun making in any shape or form due to the immense trouble, tragedy they cause and the utter MISERY inflicted on mankind by the use of them. This is underlined by the recent terrible children shooting in the USA.
This far from an isolated incident. I wish our government to make a stand to banning manafacture of guns and other similar instruments of death. I also wish this government to strive to get this message acrross to other countries killing people with guns. STOP MAKING GUNS NOW!
